attributes.additional_details: The UK banned fur farms here 20 years ago but there are still over 400 in the US and many more across the world. This suffering, torture and murder of innocent animals needs to be put to an end once and for all. We do not need to wear real fur anymore. It is barbaric and cruel and it need to end now  These poor animals are kept in horrendous conditions. They often have ammonia burns from sitting in their own urine.they chew off their own tails from stress and murdered for fashion. It’s enough
attributes.background: Fur farms need to be banned worldwide. The conditions they live in and the treatment they suffer daily is abhorrent. It is a sick institution that needs to end. We don’t need to wear real fur anymore. You cannot deny that it is the murder of innocent animals. Cruel beyond belief and it needs to end

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for. Decisions about fur trapping in other countries is a matter for the governments and legislatures of those countries.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330783
